Html:
Hi,

I have managed to get mp3 files streaming to Apple Airport Express devices using a combination of NAudio and JustePort.

It is a small part of a much larger distributed audio project I am working on, but if anyone is interested in wanting to play various sound formats using their Aiport Express without iTunes, I have working code.

Cheers
cool, glad you got it all working
